TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationSchemeSelector extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function AuthenticationSchemeSelector(httpRequest As HttpListenerRequest) As AuthenticationSchemes
type AuthenticationSchemeSelector = delegate of HttpListenerRequest -> AuthenticationSchemes

Docs.param: The instance for which to select an authentication scheme.
Docs.summary: Selects the authentication scheme for an instance.
Docs.returns: One of the values that indicates the method of authentication to use for the specified client request.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Delegates of this type are used by <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instances to select an authentication scheme based on the characteristics of a request.
An <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector> delegate is passed an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> object for each incoming request that has not provided authentication information. The method invoked by the delegate uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> object and any other available information to decide which authentication scheme to require. The delegate is specified by using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> property.
## Examples The following example uses an instance of this type to set the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> property.
